distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for postgresql16 fixes the following issues:

- Upgrade to 14.13 (bsc#1229013)
- CVE-2024-7348: PostgreSQL relation replacement during pg_dump executes arbitrary SQL. (bsc#1229013)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition in pg_dump in PostgreSQL allows an object creator to execute arbitrary SQL functions as the user running pg_dump, which is often a superuser. The attack involves replacing another relation type with a view or foreign table. The attack requires waiting for pg_dump to start, but winning the race condition is trivial if the attacker retains an open transaction. Versions before PostgreSQL 16.4, 15.8, 14.13, 13.16, and 12.20 are affected.
notes.title: CVE description
